text: Andrade Antunes Anderson (born 15 November 1981) is a Brazilian football player.Soccerway.com, "Andrade Anderson"; retrieved 2012-3-3. He plays for Carmelita. ==Club statistics== Updated to 23 February 2016.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2016J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑", 10 February 2016, Japan, (p. 207 out of 289) Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup Total Total 2006 Mito HollyHock J2 League 43 17 1 0 44 17 2007 Sagan Tosu J2 League 13 2 0 0 13 2 2007 Shimizu S-Pulse J1 League 1 0 0 0 1 0 2008 Yokohama FC J2 League 36 16 1 0 37 16 2014 Roasso Kumamoto J2 League 7 4 0 0 7 4 2015 Roasso Kumamoto J2 League 3 0 0 0 3 0 Total Total Total 103 39 2 0 105 39 ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state)
